{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-162-24-B
|Item_parent=Sexually transmitted infections (STI): gonococcal, chlamydial, syphilis, human papillomavirus (HPV), trichomoniasis
|Item_parent_short=Sexually transmitted infections (STI): gonococcal, chlamydial, syphilis, human papillomavirus (HPV), trichomoniasis
|Rank=B
|Title=Knowing the clinical signs of late syphilis
|Description=None
|Rubric=Positive diagnosis
|Contributors=
|Order=24}}
Late latent syphilis is defined by the absence of clinical signs and the discovery of a positive serology test with a presumed contact date of more than one year.

The clinical forms of tertiary syphilis are :

o Gummy syphilis

o Bone syphilis

o Cardiovascular syphilis (aortitis, coronary stenosis, etc.)

o Tertiary neurosyphilis

o Tobacco

question.title: What is the definition of late latent syphilis?
question.description: Late latent syphilis is characterized by the absence of clinical signs and a positive serology test with a presumed contact date of more than one year. What best describes this condition?

option_a.title: The presence of clinical signs and a positive serology test with a presumed contact date of less than one year
option_a.description: This option is incorrect, but it is a plausible distractor that might confuse the respondent.

option_b.title: The absence of clinical signs and a positive serology test with a presumed contact date of more than one year
option_b.description: This is the correct answer, as it accurately describes the definition of late latent syphilis.

option_c.title: The presence of clinical signs and a negative serology test with a presumed contact date of more than one year
option_c.description: This option is incorrect, but it is a plausible distractor that might confuse the respondent.

option_d.title: The presence of clinical signs and a positive serology test with a presumed contact date of less than one year
option_d.description: This option is incorrect, but it is a plausible distractor that might confuse the respondent.

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
